attributes.action: Allow a national holiday once every year for egging voted for MPs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Have phone-ins to vote for 10 MPs to be egged on national TV and hold a national holiday to celebrate the event. THis could be a major tourist attraction as well as the fact that the phone lines for the votes will probably be premium rate and raise lots of money. May I suggest the MPs donate the money raised to various charities.Jack Smithies.
